title: Video: Nude Beach – Walkin’ Down My Street
content:
Channeling the spirit of Springsteen and 60’s beach-pop, Washington D.

C. trio Nude Beach released on of the essential records of 2012 in the form of II. Chaotic, frenetic and unashamedly catchy, they’re a band that are nigh on impossible to not love, as shown by the new video for recent ‘single’ Walkin’ Down My Street. Capturing the very essence of the group and their manic live shows, it’s three minutes of beer guzzling, pizza munching, sweat drenched mayhem, and boy is it great.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
